79637.summary: Some customers in the West Park area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79637.title: July 5 - Red Deer (West Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

79635.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79635.title: July 5 - Calgary (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
